description: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.
keywords: genetic,traitor,machete cortez character,close up of eye,espionage
name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams

review.name: more fun than its occasionally silly predecessor
review.reviewBody: As the story begins, Juni and Carmen Cortez are agents on the rise in the new Spy Kids division of the OSS. Despite all of their skills and accomplishments, they're denied a promotion in the agency as a result of blatant nepotism. Still determined to make their mark—and more importantly to upstage a pair of rival agents—they intervene in a mission to travel to a mysterious island and retrieve a sophisticated thingamajig that could be a potent threat if it falls into the wrong hands. Engaging sequel is far less cheesy than its predecessor, has a much better story, and lots of imaginative visual effects accompanied by exciting, cliffhanger action scenes. Overlong, and still corny at times, but has just enough ingredients to entertain all audiences. ***

trailer.name: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
